- Updated to iOS 9 & watchOS 2.x

- Added Google Street View for properties map where available

Propertyfinder is committed to making searching for properties in the Middle East as easy as possible. The propertyfinder iOS app is regularly updated for speed and reliability and all new features will be highlighted within the app.

---------------

تسعى شركة بروبرتي فايندر بجعل عملية البحث عن عقارات في الشرق الأوسط سهلة وممتعة، لذلك دائمًا ما يخضع التطبيق لعمليات تحديث مستمرة تضمن لك سرعة تصفح مثالية ودقة بحث متناهية، وسيتم دائمًا الإعلان على الخصائص الجديدة في التطبيق.

We have fixed some bugs to make finding your next home even easier. We are always working hard to make improvements, so please continue to send your feedback. We appreciate it!
We have fixed some bugs to make finding your next home even easier. We are always working hard to make improvements, so please continue to send your feedback. We appreciate it!

We're constantly working to make your property search experience the best it can possibly be. That's why we're thrilled to introduce this newly redesigned interface which brings a more inviting color pallet and improved navigation. Now browsing, filtering, sorting, and favoriting all our awesome properties is even more intuitive. We're now working with even more partners than ever in the UAE region so your dream property is never more than a click away!

-Bug fixes
-Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

We made some improvements to our Mortgage Finder widget to help home buyers secure the mortgage that’s right for them. Additionally, you might notice that some phone numbers you call will not have an extra extension added to the end. But worry not, this is simply a way for our agents to know exactly the property you’re calling about. This way, when following up with you about a missed call, agents will have all the relevant information about the property in which you’re interested before you having to tell them. We think it’ll be a huge time saver and will help get our customers to the next step of finding a dream home even faster.
-Bug fixes

We update the app regularly to improve your property search experience. We’ve added ‘New Property’ alerts to help you find your new property faster.

يتم تطوير التطبيق بشكل دائم حرصاً منا لتقديم أفضل الخدمات للمستخدمين، لذلك تم إضافة خاصية تنبيهات لمساعدتك لإيجاد عقارك المناسب بسرعة وسهولة.

We update the app regularly to improve your property search experience. We’ve added ‘New Property’ alerts to help you find your new property faster.

يتم تطوير التطبيق بشكل دائم حرصاً منا لتقديم أفضل الخدمات للمستخدمين، لذلك تم إضافة خاصية تنبيهات لمساعدتك لإيجاد عقارك المناسب بسرعة وسهولة.

Want more control over your property search? We’ve created a new Settings tab that will give you just that! You can now sign up for alerts, and over the next few releases we'll be adding preferences for country, language, currency, and more!

We’d love to hear your suggestions for future features so please rate the app and write a review with your thoughts.

هل ترغب بتطوير تجربة بحثك عن عقار؟
تم إضافة خاصية التحكم بالإعدادات، والتي توفر لك تجربة بحث إحترافية ومتطورة، حيث تتيح لك التسجيل وتفعيل التنبيهات لإبلاغك عن عقارك المناسب.
وسيتم إضافة خاصية تحديد الدولة واللغة والعملة وغيرها الكثير في الإصدارات القادمة. يسعدنا استقبال اقتراحاتك لإضافة خصائص جديدة للتطبيق، الرجاء تقييم التطبيق وكتابة رأيك واقتراحاتك في الملاحظات أدناه.

Want more control over your property search? We’ve created a new Settings tab that will give you just that! You can now sign up for alerts, and over the next few releases we'll be adding preferences for country, language, currency, and more!

We’d love to hear your suggestions for future features so please rate the app and write a review with your thoughts.

هل ترغب بتطوير تجربة بحثك عن عقار؟
تم إضافة خاصية التحكم بالإعدادات، والتي توفر لك تجربة بحث إحترافية ومتطورة، حيث تتيح لك التسجيل وتفعيل التنبيهات لإبلاغك عن عقارك المناسب.
وسيتم إضافة خاصية تحديد الدولة واللغة والعملة وغيرها الكثير في الإصدارات القادمة. يسعدنا استقبال اقتراحاتك لإضافة خصائص جديدة للتطبيق، الرجاء تقييم التطبيق وكتابة رأيك واقتراحاتك في الملاحظات أدناه.
This update fixes a couple pesky bugs, and serves up two new login options! In addition to the existing Facebook login, you can now use either your Propertyfinder or Google account.
This update fixes a couple pesky bugs, and serves up two new login options! In addition to the existing Facebook login, you can now use either your Propertyfinder or Google account.
- Advanced push notifications
- Advanced push notifications

Now it’s easier than ever to afford your dream home!
We’ve added a feature to help you find the best mortgage to fit your needs. Simply scroll down on any sale property page to see an estimated monthly mortgage price. From there you can get a personalized rate based on your specific needs and circumstances.

Now it’s easier than ever to afford your dream home!
We’ve added a feature to help you find the best mortgage to fit your needs. Simply scroll down on any sale property page to see an estimated monthly mortgage price. From there you can get a personalized rate based on your specific needs and circumstances.

This release contains a couple back-end improvements to increase reliability and compatibility with our newly improved infrastructure. You can now expect your search results to load even faster with all the great properties you’ve come to expect from Property Finder!

هذه النسخة تتضمن بعض التحسينات من أجل الرفع من المصداقية والتوافق مع البنية الأساسية التي قمنا بتطويرها حديثًا. نتائج البحث ستظهر بشكل أسرع من أجل اكتشاف جميع العقارات الرائعة التي تتوقعها من (ساروتي -- بروبرتي فايندر

We made some improvements to our Mortgage Finder widget to help home buyers secure the mortgage that’s right for them. Additionally, you might notice that some phone numbers you call will not have an extra extension added to the end. But worry not, this is simply a way for our agents to know exactly the property you’re calling about. This way, when following up with you about a missed call, agents will have all the relevant information about the property in which you’re interested before you having to tell them. We think it’ll be a huge time saver and will help get our customers to the next step of finding a dream home even faster.

We've got many exciting improvements coming up soon. In this version we'll be testing certain improvements to the app search experience with full rollout coming soon.
We've got many exciting improvements coming up soon. In this version we'll be testing certain improvements to the app search experience with full rollout coming soon.

The new Property Finder search redesign is finally here! After months of painstaking work, we’re pleased to present a completely re-imagined search experience. Every part of our app property search has been redesigned and re-engineered. Property listings are bigger with scrollable images, meaning that you no longer have to click a property just to see what it looks like. The map and sort buttons are more prominent and easier to find so now you can explore your city any way you like. And last but certainly not least, the filtering experience is all new and all brilliant. Now more than ever you can zero in on the perfect property for you - with one hand gestures and swipe controls, our new filter screen is best in class! Happy Finding!

Have you ever wondered about all the amazing properties around you? Well wonder no more - you'll now be able to search for listings located near your current position. Simply click the blue arrow in the location search field in the filters menu to get started. Please make sure to have your GPS permissions enabled.

Have you ever wondered about all the amazing properties around you? Well wonder no more - you'll now be able to search for listings located near your current position. Simply click the blue arrow in the location search field in the filters menu to get started. Please make sure to have your GPS permissions enabled.

Saving you time in your search for the perfect property is something we take very seriously. That’s why we’re introducing Recent Searches. You’ll now be able to resume a search in any area that you recently searched. Instead of having to type the location name again, you can just click on a previously searched area in the location screen. Additionally we’re releasing an onboarding guide for our newer users which explains all the awesome benefits of searching for a property with Property Finder.

Saving you time in your search for the perfect property is something we take very seriously. That’s why we’re introducing Recent Searches. You’ll now be able to resume a search in any area that you recently searched. Instead of having to type the location name again, you can just click on a previously searched area in the location screen. Additionally we’re releasing an onboarding guide for our newer users which explains all the awesome benefits of searching for a property with Property Finder.

We’ve made some improvements in the way our commercial offerings are presented in the search results page. Now it will be much easier for agents to see where their premium, featured, and community top spot appears. We’ve also implemented a fix for the push permission screen to make it more visible to property seekers.

Everyone will now be able to subscribe to property searches. You'll get a push alert when new properties that match a particular search (location and filters) to which you've subscribed. Additionally we're improving the experience of sharing properties. The share link will now direct you to the app so everyone so anyone with whom a property is shared will always have the best experience.

We’ve added a feature which retains your search filters regardless of changing categories. This means that you can now set your filters once and change between sale and rental categories as much as you’d like without losing your settings.

eSimsar is now Property Finder! We're pleased to announce that our Saudi division called eSimsar is rebranding to Property Finder. eSimsar property seekers should download this app to continue taking advantage of the same great real estate search experience they've always had. Agents, this app is for you too - you'll be able to conduct all your property related tasks from this app; simply log in to retrieve your account.

إي سمسار أصبح الآن بروبرتي فايندر!
يسعدنا إعلامكم أننا أصبحنا في المملكة العربية السعودية تحت الإسم التجاري بروبرتي فايندر. بإمكان مستخدمي إي سمسار تنزيل هذا التطبيق والإستمتاع بالحصول على تجربة عقارية رائعة. وللوسطاء العقاريين، يمكنكم الإستمرار باستخدام هذا التطبيق لكل الأغراض الإدارية لعقاراتكم،

Virtual Tours:
Unable to attend a property in person? The app now supports virtual tours of our property listings. If the agent has filmed a digital tour of the property, you’ll be able to see it on the property details page.

Apple Sign In:
In this update we have also enabled the ability to Sign in with Apple, giving you more options to set up your account with Property Finder.

Virtual Tours:

Apple Sign In:
In this update we have also enabled the ability to Sign in with Apple, giving you more options to set up your account with Property Finder.

WhatsApp:
You can now contact the agent of the property via WhatsApp directly from the app, making it easier to get in touch and find out more.

Thank you for using Property Finder! We've made lots of bug fixes and performance improvements to make your home search experience even smoother.

What's new?
• Saved searches — save your search preferences so you can quickly see when a property that fits your needs comes onto the market.
• Language preference selection — you can now choose your preferred app language in the "My Account" section.

Do you have any ideas for updates? We would love to hear them. Leave us feedback in the "My Account" section.
